thread.title: Volkswagen Buybacks Fill Showrooms; Trick Is Getting Owners to Stay
thread.title_full: Volkswagen Buybacks Fill Showrooms; Trick Is Getting Owners to Stay - WSJ

author: Adrienne Roberts
title: Volkswagen Buybacks Fill Showrooms; Trick Is Getting Owners to Stay
text:
Volkswagen AG has bought back 125,000 diesel vehicles from owners affected by the companyâ€™s emissions-cheating scheme, helping spur showroom traffic in recent months for hundreds of U.S. dealers who weathered brutal sales declines in the wake of the scandal.

The company kicked off a buyback program in November, leading to a 20.7% sales increase for its namesake VW brand in the three-month period ending in January compared to the...
